# setStencilStoreAction(_:)

**Instance Method**

Specifies a known store action to replace the initial [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStoreAction/unknown] value specified for a given stencil attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
func setStencilStoreAction(_ storeAction: MTLStoreAction)
```

## Parameters

- **storeAction**: The desired store action for the stencil attachment. This value canâ€™t be [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStoreAction/unknown].

## Discussion

If the store action for the given stencil attachment was set to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStoreAction/unknown] when the parallel render command encoder was created, you need to call this method to specify another store action before you call the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandEncoder/endEncoding()] method.

## Setting render pass state

- **setColorStoreAction(_:index:)**: Specifies a known store action to replace the initial [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStoreAction/unknown] value specified for a given color attachment.
- **setColorStoreActionOptions(_:index:)**: Specifies known store action options for a given color attachment.
- **setDepthStoreAction(_:)**: Specifies a known store action to replace the initial [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStoreAction/unknown] value specified for a given depth attachment.
- **setDepthStoreActionOptions(_:)**: Specifies known store action options for a given depth attachment.
- **setStencilStoreActionOptions(_:)**: Specifies known store action options for a given stencil attachment.
